about_the_game:
A collection of game music composed by Masahiro Kajiwara.
Covers songs recorded in the arcade version, Sega Dreamcast version, Xbox 360 version, and others.

・DISK1...Dreamcast's first limited edition "Sound Anchor" included 32 songs
Configure with songs arranged in the arcade version and the dream cast version
・DISK2...25 songs included in "RE: Sound Anchor" created to commemorate the release of NitendoSwitch
Composed of songs arranged for XBOX360 version and i-mode
